snippet: Safety concerns about the Osprey have become a lightning rod for deeper grievances about the American military presence on the island.
abstract: United States military sends the first batch of MV-22 Osprey aircraft to Okinawa air base, going forward with its planned deployment despite unexpectedly fierce opposition by islanders and warnings that any crash of the accident-plagued planes could threaten American military presence on the island.
lead_paragraph: Safety concerns about the Osprey have become a lightning rod for deeper grievances about the American military presence on the island.

headline.seo: U.S. Sends Ospreys to Okinawa, Despite Fierce Opposition
headline.print_headline: U.S. Sends New Aircraft to Okinawa, Despite Fierce Opposition

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
